p: Acute respiratory distress syndrome has classic inflammatory signs, a so‐called “cytokine storm” characterized by a significant increase in cytokines and proinflammatory chemokines. What is less typical for corona infections is the destruction of the alveolo‐capillary barrier, which seldom happens also in COVID‐19, but when it does, requires fast intervention. ARDS can also occur in younger individuals during the healing phase, which, in this case though, may be linked to the immune response.
